profile:
Kingsway Paving & Interlocking is located north of Toronto. We provide asphalt paving and interlocking paver services for your residential and commercial needs. We are professional paving and interlocking contractors serving customers in the Greater Toronto Area.
 
Whether you are looking to have your driveway paved with asphalt, interlocking using paver stones for your driveway and walkway, backyard patio or need us for your commercial needs for parking lots. We do it all! Consider Kingsway Paving & Interlocking as your driveway contractor and select using asphalt paving, interlocking pavers or concrete.
 
We have the expertise and back up our work with a 1 year warranty. Our experience, knowledge, personnel and equipment gives us the assurance that we can provide you with a service for all your asphalt paving and interlocking needs for your home, commercial & industrial requirements. Our commercial services
 
Kingsway paving & Interlocking has been in business for over 30 years providing quality workmanship to customers in the GTA. Get a quote from the professionals before you start any work on your driveway, walkway or outdoor patio, You will be glad you did.
services:

commercial paving

profile:
Getting to know about Tottenham Paving and Construction is easy!
Tottenham Paving & Construction Ltd
is a Professional Asphalt Paving
and Construction Contractor.
The company specializes in all facets of asphalt paving, concrete, patterned concrete, and interlocking brick applications in both residential and commercial project settings.

Owner/Operator John Genova has experience that pre-dates the company’s inception in 2008.

John has worked since he was a teenager under the tutelage of his father’s 50 years of top notch and highly respected experience in the paving/construction industry.

John now has over 30 years of experience in the paving/interlock industry, and extensive experience in concrete to bring to your next paving or construction project.

Tottenham Paving & Construction LTD, has served property owners, property managers and commercial clients as the reputable, professional choice when selecting a paving company for their asphalt paving needs.

We perform commercial and residential paving in Newmarket, Aurora, Bradford, West/East Gwillimbury, Tottenham, Alliston, Beeton, Loretto, and many other areas in and around the Greater Toronto Area.

OUR GUARANTEE

All work and materials are guaranteed for one year.
Tottenham Paving & Construction prides itself on expert workmanship and great service. Service that includes building trust relationships will all of our customers. Tottenham Paving & Construction Ltd, individually engineers your project through every step of the process to ensure a high quality job that our customers will be more than pleased with.

We guide, and work to educate each customer, explaining what we do in each step of the process, providing both expertise and suggestions as to how to maximize client investment in the project. We pay attention to detail, as part of our commitment to customer satisfaction. We take responsibility for our workmanship.
